author: sebb
msg: MailReaderSampler - no need to fetch all Messages if not all wanted

author: schor
msg: [UIMA-3759] Using profiler, determined that the test driver is holding on to instances of the test classes.  If those classes, in turn, have instance variables holding onto large objects, and no tearDown() sets these to null, this causes an accum. of memory use. It looks like on some JVMs/OSs, we were near the max heap.  Added tearDown cleanups to the major heap users.

author: rmuir
msg: LUCENE-5617: don't rely on directory metadata for stored fields 'maxpointer', change to hard check
